text:
PHILIP MORRIS
ASIA
REGIONAL BULLETIN
Mr .
Joseph   Tcheng,
Vice   President;,  Philip
Morris
Asia,
wishes
to
announce
the
following
changes
in
the
Taiwan
market
effective
November
1999.
Mr. Goddard Kwong is appointed National Sales Manager, reporting to
Mr_
Anthony Lau, General Manager,
Taiwan_
Goddard is
3 seasoned
sales professiona
who has extensive experience in thc markets 0f PRC,
Hong
and Taiwan.
He joined Philip Morris in
1973 and has held &
variety of responsible positions, including General Manager for the PRC
and
most recently
Director of Sales Development for Greater
China_
Goddard and his family will relocate t0 Taipei_
Mr _
Karl Hsu, who is currently Sales
&
Planning Manager, has choscn
to leave Philip Morris in order to pursue other career opportunities.
Karl
joined   Philip
Morris
Taiwan
in
1989
and
has
played
key
role
in
managing the finance
and administration functions before taking up his
current position in 1996_
Most recently Karl was
key member of
a task
force team that completed a smooth transition of the sales force from
Tait to McClane
our new distributor
Please wish Goddard success in his new appointment, and thank Karl
for his contributions to Philip Morris Taiwan
Michael P
Murphy
Vice President, Human Resources
Novcmber
999
Kong
I
